title: COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6.48ft², 600W Dehydrated Dryer, 6 Stainless Steel Trays, 48H Timer, 165°F Temperature Control, for Herbs, Meat, Fruit, and Yogurt, Silver
descriptions:
COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space.

This machine is designed in California. It uses 600W power and works on 120V, 60Hz. It is suitable for USA and Canada. Maximum temperature is 165°F (73°C). Temperature is adjustable from 95°F to 165°F. Hot air comes from the rear fan for even drying.

It has 6 stainless steel trays, each tray about 12 x 13 inches. Total drying space is about 6.48–6.5 square feet. Trays are dishwasher safe. The front door is glass, so you can see food without opening. Control is digital with touch-control LED display. Timer can set up to 48 hours in 30-minute steps. Memory function can remember last settings.

Noise level is under 48 dB for quiet operation. Safety features include auto shutoff and overheat protection. The product helps extend shelf life of foods.

Included accessories:
- 1 stainless steel mesh screen (about 10.7 x 11.8 inches) for small or delicate pieces.
- 1 fruit roll sheet (about 11.3 x 12.8 inches) for fruit leather or sauces.
- Recipe book with 50 recipes.

Use ideas: jerky, fruits, vegetables, herbs, yogurt, pet treats, fruit rolls.

Notes:
- For indoor household use only.
- Please check your outlet is 120V before use.
- Clean trays before first use; trays are dishwasher safe, other parts wipe with damp cloth.
- Do not block rear fan for good air circulation.

What you receive:
- COSORI Food Dehydrator main unit with glass door.
- 6 stainless steel trays.
- 1 mesh screen.
- 1 fruit roll sheet.
- 50-recipe booklet.
- User manual.
